title: Digital Badge Program Design and Operation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and foundational instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: A process of practicing digital badge design in blended environments, completing the program through peer feedback and iterative improvement

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three educational purposes and utilization strategies for digital badges.
Learners can execute draft-feedback-revision stages of a badge program using an iterative design process.
Learners can validate the effectiveness of badge programs through peer assessment with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can create one prototype integrating visible/technical elements of badges (e.g., metadata, design).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
